supportDesc.support: Groups of paperburial records are kept inside of labled lot manila folders. Groups of cardstockownership and interment cards are kept inside of labled card catalog box.

layoutDesc.layout: A hilltop section of the graveyard that is approximately # square feet square feet, comprised of # headstones and two mausoleums.
